name: Potion
text: Remove up to 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon.

effect.text: Remove up to 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon.

synergies: Low HP Pokemon - 20 HP is more significant
counters: High damage attacks make healing insignificant

competitiveHistory: Potion saw minimal competitive play due to its low healing amount. Super Potion was generally preferred despite its cost.

rulings.ruling: You can remove fewer than 2 damage counters if the Pokemon has less damage.
You can use Potion on any of your Pokemon, Active or Benched.
